content.detailedDescription: My father was picking me and my brothers up from my mother's house, i had just gotten back from college. we were driving along route 52 in pine bush when i spotted an orange orb just floating outside the drivers side window of the car. my dad is deaf so i was signing to him when i saw the orb. i then pointed it out to him, at first my father said it was an airplane, but then i said look again, and he said it definately was not an airplane. it was just following us for about 5 minutes and then it disappeared as soon as we looked away from it. we turned left down a side road, and then it reappeared on my side of the car. it was about 300 feet in the air and about 100-150 feet away from the car at all times. it followed us some more and then disappeared again about 7-8 minutes after it appeared on my side of the car. it followed us into the town of wallkill and disappeared when it was over a river and we were on a bridge. my brothers passed it off as an airplane, but my dad and i know it wasn't. it was a soft glowing orange orb, and it didn't hurt to look at it, so it wasn't very bright, but at the same time to us it was. what made me report this was the pa case number 13043, which happened within 200 miles of each other 2 days apart. i know what i saw
content.summary: This sounds exactly like case number 13043, the grove case in pa.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an avid reader of books on the subjects of ufo's and ancient civilizations. and as much as i believe nothing could prepare me for this encounter at 7 a.M. 10-14-08. i was startled when my mother suddenly woke me from my sleep telling me very nervously to come outside. i did. she pointed to the dark sky in a southeasternly direction. at first, my sleep still fresh in my eyes, i noticed nothing unusual. but as my eyes came into focus i saw what she had pointed out. what looked to be bright stars suddenly were recognized as orange and had a distinct hazy radiance about them. could just be stars i told myself. and that could have easily been left at that. but as i noticed there where 3 of them i looked from one to the next and noticed they where moving very slowly- but yes! they were moving. and not only moving but were holding a distinct triangular/boomerang pattern! i was excited yet baffled. in all the years i have studied the clues left in the history of earth's civilisation's encounters and books i have read- i had never seen any! as i watched they slowly faded from view. the sky still black at this point! also i looked up reports for the area and found several simialar sightings describing the same recently. what is this phenomenom?

                                           sincerely,
                                                    
                                                     brandon
content.summary: 3 orange  hazy lights in a triangular slow-moving triangular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 4 or five. it was october of 1983. my mother took me with her now ex-husband. to look for a new place to live. we were in claridge pa. this place was a yellow duplex apartment right across the parking lot to the fire station/ fire hall. we were in the back yard and from what i can remeber the sun was just starting to go down and my parents were talking with the owners of the house. i think they were an older couple maybe in their 50's at the time. i could be wrong
 while they were talkin i was told to be good and not interupt. during this time i noticed something directly over top of us. it was round it had alot of lights and i had never seen anything like this and didn't know what it was. so i said" mommy look at the funny airplane" she would tell me "not now, don't interupt. wait till were done then tell me what you want." and she would continue on with her conversation. and i tried repeadetly to get her to look. but she wouldn't. i looked at this thing for easily 20 minutes. 
  to this day she say's she so sorry for not listening and told me ever since that happened she would always listen to us no matter what it was cause of this experience. she sorta feels like something or someone was  putting thoughts in her head to correct me when i was trying to show them what i saw cause she never used to do that , not until that moment. 
   when she finally finished talking to these people with her now ex-husband. she saw the funny airplane. it was a saucer sitting directly above us. it had lights that were rectangler outlining the outer rim of the ship. it also had lights on the inner part too. some were round maybe oval. some were rectangle. they were multi colored. red,blue,yellow,white, green seemed like every color of the rainbow. and the whole thing was spinning around. i can still to this day remember it like it was last night. well she grabbed me up , put me in her car. and her ex got into his truck and we followed him out of there.
   the whole time there was 2 of these discs. the second one appeared when we were leaving that area. and they flew at an angle. and they seemed to follow us directly over top of us. when we would stop for a stop sign. the disc's would stop too. completely copying our movements.
   my mom and ex stepfather stopped and he got out and came to our window to talk to her about these things. and thats when they shot off torwards jeanette , pa 
  i don't like telling people this story cause it sounds crazy. but it's the truth. i don't care who believes me. just cause someone thinks it s a joke im not gonna forget this and trick myself into thinking it never happend. cause it did.
content.summary: Was little kid about 4 saw funny looking airplane. tried to get my moms attention to look at it.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo spotted in dc  http://webcamufo.Com
content.summary: Ufo spotted in dc  http://webcamufo.Com

content.detailedDescription:
i saw this peculiar cloud formation on october 11, 2008 in the early afternoon. the strange part was that it had what looked like a spinning current erupting from its center. i did not notice any active rotation at the time, but it has a definite spiral appearance to it. the formation dissipated a few moments after i took these shots, but it filled the sky at the time. i've never seen a cloud with this pattern or movement. upon closer examination and magnification of the three photos, i noticed that there were strange objects in and around the clouds. they were not visible to the eye, but they appeared on these pictures.

    these objects were completely silent, and i could not hear anything in the skies. the object in img0071 is hard to see. it is in the top right quarter of the image, pretty much in the middle of that quarter. this object looks like a disc, but it is so small that its hard to tell. i can send a highlighted version of this picture to show you if necessary, but there were only three slots available and i wanted to post the pictures i had. in img0072, the object appears to be at the top of the cloud vortex or pillar, and looks teardrop in appearance. one side of the object appears metallic, while the other side was very dark and slightly purple. finally, in img0073, there are now two objects in the top right quarter of the picture, each disc or spherical shaped and dark. all of these shots are taken on a canon digital rebel xt camera with an efs18-55mm lens. 

    like i said previously, i wanted to take pictures of this weird cloud and did not even see the objects at the time. had i known that there were objects there i would have put my telescopic lens on. seeing these objects and this peculiar cloud funnel has definitely made me believe that something is going on that we are not aware of.
content.summary: Strange cloud vortex and disc-shaped objects over grampian, pa

content.detailedDescription: This was the fifth consecutive night of sightings. the other four might be explainable, different objects, but not this one. needless to say i was looking. i walked outside to smoke a cigarette, as soon as i looked up in a west direction, i looked right to the object. it was a white orb of light with a dim circle in the middle. it was just above a cloud, maybe 20 ft. it seemed to be following above and at the same speed as the cloud. i watched it for about fifteen seconds. it was less than 1/8 of a mile away. i got a feeling to wave hello, when i did the object faded almost immediately. less than a second later a shadow went over me, and with lack of a better way to describe, went through me. i felt it. my vision went dark for about five seconds from within. blindness.
content.summary: Dimly lit white orb

content.detailedDescription:
My wife awoke early that morning around 4:15 a.M. and let our dog out. standing at the back door, facing due south, she saw a very unuseual set of lights approaching from the southwest and traveling toward the northeast. she described two large white lights, with a somewhat smaller
red light in the middle; none of which was flashing. since it was a dark night , with no moon, but clear, she was unable to distinguish any definitive shape
of the craft. the object was traveling at a fairly high rate of speed and tracked over our house but made no sound. she described the white lights as appearing to be maybe 3 ft. in diameter, with the red light in the middle at maybe 1.5 ft. in diameter. from her description, and being a former pilot, i would estimate it,s altitude at about 1,000 to 1,500 ft.
the lights were visible from the approach thur the departure, until it went out of sight behind the hills to the northeast,as if they were on the bottom of the craft. we have a ridge of hills on both the east and west side of our house so she had only about a 110 degree field of visibility
from horizon to horizon. total viewing time approximately 20-25 seconds.
she immediately came back and reported to me that she had just seen a ufo.

our exact location is n35.42697-w86.87725.

i also witnessed a very large craft up close and personal in the late 7o's
if you are interested in reports that far back. let me know.

thanks
don odum
content.summary: Wife observed lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Flashing color-changing lights. moved erratically. directly north over lake superior. we watched it for over an hour, then got too spooked and went inside.
it was silent and changed directs in a very odd manner. left right up down and diagonally, while also sitting still for periods of time. 
it went blue, green red and yellow, all erratically.  look to be about the size of a large star (or similar in size to the planet venus this time of year)
it moved in such strange ways. then over to the left of it a bright flash, like a star exploding. i was looking right at the bright flash and it was so bright and fast it made me blink. my husband was looking at directly to the right of it, at the odd changing colors/,moving object and he saw the flash to the side as well.
content.summary: Like a star but changing colors red, blue, green, yellow. moved very erratically, and a bright flash

content.detailedDescription:
At 8.30 pm (october 13th) brasil time our plane was desecending towards brasilia when myself and a friend spotted what looked like a large meteor or something coming through the atmosphere. it was pretty high up and was above the clouds so could only be spotted from air.
it was glowing bright red and had a long trail and most strangely it didn't move at all. we continued to watch the object during the descent of the plane and it remained in its position and didn't move. (i went to take some photos on my iphone but was stopped by the damn stewardess for using a phone!).
content.summary: Large metror like red flame object over brasillia seen from plane

content.detailedDescription:
my good friend and i, both students at the university of michigan, were sitting on a lawn on campus. my friend was laying down, looking at the sky, when all of the sudden (at 10:58 p.M., est), he said, "jake, shooting star!" at which point, i looked up and saw, directly above us (and no discernible distance away), three collinear lights. these lights were about the same size and shape as the stars around them, but were quite a bit brighter, and a light yellowish-orange color. i realized immediately (i've seen my fair share of shootings stars and the like) that this was unlike anything i have ever seen, and became very excited. i jumped up and watched closely.

   the three lights, all aligned with each other, appeared (according to my friend; i did not witness them appearing, having been alerted to their presence about a half-second after he first saw them) all at once, instantaneously, superimposed on the constellation cassiopeia. right away, they began moving directly west from us, very quickly. they covered about a quarter of the sky in about three seconds. they were only visible to us for this time, three seconds, until they disappeared from view, either behind trees or out of the sky (i cannot recall entirely).

   there was only one motion, east to west. the three lights all moved with each other, but as they went further away, they appeared to get closer to each other--though this could be due to our perspective. no sound was observed, nor was there any other observed structure associated with the lights.

again, we witnessed this on the night of october 11th 2008, within a minute of 10:58 p.M. the lights were certainly not a plane--moving too quickly and with no noise; nor could they have been a bird, satellite, or other astrological / meteorological event.

jake
content.summary: Sudden appearance of a line of three yellowish-white lights that proceeded to fly away very fast.

content.detailedDescription: The past three nights orbs have been seen off the port sheldon peir north of holland, stealth jets were following wahtever these things were, the orange orbs were making drastic up and down manuvers at incredable speeds. this past friday 6 jets were seen speeding in the diresction of the orbs, one of which was positivley identified as a stealth. the jets cicled around for over two hours as the orbs appeared and dissapeared. the orbs were seen by many witnesses on lake michigan off port sheldon peir. the same orbs were seen in 2001 making similar manuvers. incredble speeds and decents and stops that would kill any person. whatever was out there the military was very inturested. this siting went on for hours, till the point where i coulndt watch anymore. the only way to describe it was they were making w like patterns in the sky. and the stealth could not even keep up with these objects. truley unexplained flying objects. and at one point they hung in a triangle like pattern for several minutes
content.summary: Orbs off port sheldon peir

content.detailedDescription:
My fiancee, her children and i were camping out in pi pi valley in the california sierra mts.  they had gone into the tent, but, it being a nice night, i decided to sit up and watch the stars for awhile.  the night was very dark.  so dark that i couldn't even see my hand six inches from my eyes.  the stars were very brilliant, and a few minutes after watching them i noticed that some of the stars were like dancing in the sky.  so i focused on them, and saw that they were like chasing one another.  then,  about ten minutes later a third one came and they were all like chasing one another like in a game of tag.
  it was  like watching a ballet dance.  i called another camper to come and watch with me, which he did.  after a few minutes - maybe 10 or so, he said that watyching those things make him sscared, so he went back inside his own tent.
i watched these objects for at least 2 hours, maybe more, when all at once they all zoomed off at a fantastic rate of speed and vanished in a second.
content.summary: Saw star-like lights playing tag in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
October 3rd  diane (last name omitted) report:

friday night around 7:30pm, i saw a large white circular light heading west to east in the northern sky. it caught my attention because of it���s
brightness. it had a straight path across the sky, no zig zagging, no falling and it did not streak across the sky. it just looked like it was on a straight path. there were no other lights on it and there was no ���tail��� like a comet. i continued to watch it until it literally faded out. it became almost a translucent grayis/silver color then faded and disappeared. 

october 6th
monday night about 7:10pm, i was out in the yard with my dogs and i noticed another light. it was a very white light, round and it appeared as if the light were on a craft facing me, however it didn���t appear to be moving in my direction. it was traveling more north to south, and appeared to stop and go, it did this twice but very briefly. i looked at a star that was by the moon for comparison, and it was about the same size. i watched the light for about 2 minutes, then it just got smaller and smaller and was gone. as it was getting smaller, it did not appear to be going faster.

note: i���m checking satellite positions for this region and time periods. there is a small airport nearby, but no sound was detected. colorado springs airport���s flight path it near the area depending on weather, but the airplanes taking off and landing would be noticeably larger than what the eye witness reported. (chuck zukowski)

submitted by:
chuck zukowski
independent ufo investigations
www.Ufonut.Com
for more info on sighting please contact me at: 
zukowski@ufonut.Com
content.summary: Large white circular light heading west to east in the northern sky.

content.detailedDescription: Saw an object over colne, lancashire, uk, on google earth. shaped like a 30 mile wide square hat. shadow cast exact shape and size 6.6 miles away from object. i called mufon. object moved towards keighly, bradford, then north about 10 miles. by the time i began this it had completely disappeared. love, light and luck to you all.
content.summary: Google earth object

content.detailedDescription: Object was white. was not an airplane, as there were many airplanes in the area with contrails. it was bulging in the center. it completely disappeared into thin air. it was very visible in the daytime. object was headed north. we were at home, sitting outside. i think around 5 miles in the air. we were looking at the clouds and sky at some of the airplanes and noticed this object.
content.summary: Ufo in ontario, bulging in middle and white

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with my good buddy, peter (aka skinny pete - you may have heard of him), when we saw an extremely bright, fast-moving object flew over the city of birmingham, al, for just over an hour.  it appeared to 'inhale' clouds as it went, perhaps consuming them for future study.

the brightness oscillated periodically, so much so that i thought i could make out windows now and again, with dark silhouettes behind them.  one of the figures appeared to wave.

my friend peter was with me, and swore he could hear a high pitched frequency eminating from within, as though it were supersonic.  at one point, his eyes rolled up into the back of his head and he passed out for almost a minute.  his bowels cleared when this happened, and we had to take him to a public restroom.  unfortunately, the object disappeared after that.

after waking up, peter told us he heard someone speaking to him while he was unconscious, in a language he didn't understand, but he thought it was a sympathetic voice.  all the while, he saw images of green pastures.  (peter is a farmer of sorts, so this made sense to us.)

we took peter to a walk-in clinic shortly thereafter because he felt so nauseated -- they told us there that he was severely dehydrated and even a little anemic.  after receiving a couple liters of saline, peter was doing much better, but none of us will soon forget this experience.

yours truly,

randy m.

p.S.  i've attached an interpretive drawing so you can visualize what i mean.
content.summary: Garish and rapacious oval object flying 200mph or more, eating clouds, casues dehydrationa nd anemia

content.detailedDescription:
About 15 miles from an airport, my boyfriend and i had noticed a large black triangular shape that appeared to hover about 20 feet over the trees while we were driving. i saw 1 light underneath/front and at that angle i could see some light from the back. as we passed, we noticed there were 3 lights in a straight line on the back of it. it then turned and started moving in our direction and my boyfriend noticed 3 blinking lights in a sequence we had never seen on a plane. it then disappeared behind the trees. 

the whole time we were looking at it i kept thinking "that is not a plane".
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered over the trees. three lights in the back and 1 underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed in the southwest sky a bright light. it seemed to move so i fixed my vision on a large blinking red communications tower in the distance to use as a reference point. after i fixed my vision i could confirm it was moving. it pulsed and lit up, several sparkling lights came from around it all over the same area. these lights were random and totaled about 5-6. i watched it travel across the sky in a southern direction. the light faded in the distance and another appeared in the same southwest location and repeated the same event. i woke my wife up from a sleep to come out and see the event. she confirmed the large object did in fact move right to left and up and down erratically. we both agreed it was not a star, plane, helicopter or satellite. she went back to bed and i continued to watch this light until it disappeared. it didn't seem to move away.

i went into my home and sat in a chair looking out the window and another light appeared in the same location. this light repeated the same event of moving, blinking, and pulsed bright and moved in a western direction. after a 1/2 of watching i went to bed. 

we live in a rural area and there is little light pollution. i am familiar with the flight patterns which typically travel north to west and east to south across the sky. these events were not consistent with normal plane travels.

i tried to photograph but the camera would not work because it was too far off in the night sky.
content.summary: 3 bright lights lit up, moved erratically up and down, right to left with sparkling lights all around it in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have decided to repost this report with all 3 photos: 
the first photo was taken directly after seeing it approach from the east end (heading westward), the second photo was taken when object was more centrally aligned with my balcony, the third photo was taken as it sped off in the west direction, fading out of sight. feel free to publicly scrutinize, validate, and/or analyse these photos. 
note:  i have mass emailed several copies of the 3 "originals" to various friends, family members, and acquaintances, should anything (mysterious) suddenly happen to me.

here is my original post: 
***i went out to my balcony to have a cigarette (i only smoke outside), then all of a sudden i saw this enormous object with flashing red and amber (?) coloured lights coming in the direction of my apartment building at a speed that must have been 6-8 times faster than i have ever seen any plane move. i quickly grabbed my hp digital camera (which i keep on a shelf right in front of my balcony door) and i captured the first photo of it (the best visual one), then i was waiting for it to pass this tree outside of my balcony to take another photo, but it seemed to slow down its speed and was taking a long time, so i captured the second photo of it through the tree (2nd best visual), then i went to take the 3rd photo and my camera's l.E.D. display read "waiting for flash to recharge", so during this time the object seemed to really speed up again (i yelled out loudly "does anyone else see that?", in attempt to get any neighbors outside at the time to look up) and was almost out of sight, but i aimed the camera in its direction and captured the 3rd photo (the least visual one) anyways.

i felt so "in awe" of its presence during the flyover, my heart was racing... this object looked like something straight out of a high-budget sci-fi movie, but it was real, and above my head in the open sky! it looked sort of like a "spiked orb", but i am not sure if the "spikes" were just a projection from the bright lights, or were actual "spikes" protruding from the "orb shaped" object. i was so excited, i had to light up another cigarette immediately after finishing the one i had smoked during the ufo sighting.

i "uploaded the pictures" to my computer as soon as i awoke the next morning (today, sunday oct. 12th/2008), as i was too shaken and excited to do it before sleeping, and i didn't want to accidentally "delete" or "lose" them in my excited state. surprisingly, the "lights i had seen, didn't appear in either 3 of the photos, but the "orb shape" itself sure did!

i am only going to upload the 2nd photo, the one with it partially obscured by the tree; but if anyone could steer me in the proper and secure method of submitting them for analysis (possibly at [u.W.O.] the university of western ontario?). this is a major event in my life, any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. i often take pictures of the sky during the day, cloud formations, chem-trails, and planes (ok, the squirrels & chipmunks playing in the tree beside my balcony too... cuz they are cute!), but that is why i keep my hp photosmart e327 5.0 megapixel camera beside my balcony door. it's not that great of a camera, but it was on sale and i am only a "beginner" (amateur) photographer.

thanks to any (and all) that can lend any type of support.***
content.summary: Reposted:  this time with all 3 photos (1st , 2nd, & 3rd) added!

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the terrace of my apartment building at 6:30 this evening when i noticed what i thought was a jet plane flying.  it's common to see jets flying south to land at newark airport.

but this "jet" wasn't flying south.  it was moving towards me (east).  as it got closer i saw it was not a jet.  i then believed for a second that it was a military aircraft.  it was shaped like a boomerang.

then it started to change shape, somewhat.  whatever this was became malleable.  at this time i knew it couldn't possibly be a jet.  no jet i know of bends and contorts.

about at this time-or maybe a few moments before--i noticed black circular objects trailing the larger boomerang.  these circular objects were also black, maybe numbering 3 or 4.

the boomerang object hovered for a few seconds over my building, before it--and the circular objects trailing it--continued in a northeastern direction, over my building.  

this would put the object right over the hudson river and new york city.  i'm certain that many others had to have witnessed this.

as the objects left my view, additional circular objects rose from the south west.  there was no boomerang, just four circular objects.  they, too, moved in a northeastern fashion.

i telephoned the west new york, nj police at 6:36 p.M. and told them that i was not crazy, but there were some very strange objects flying overhead.  the desk person said he'd take my name and if anyone else reported it he could reference it.

just as we were speaking, additional circle objects rose again from the southwest.  i told him what i was seeing and he said to get a camera.  i yelled for my roommate to get my camera.  i took a picture but the black circles were too far in the distance.  and they did not follow the same flight plan.  they moved north, not north east.  so i did not, unfortunately, get them on camera.

i waited for additional objects, but then the sun light was gone.  

who knows what i witnessed?  of course, the logical brain says to myself that it "must have" been some type of balloons being released.  but balloons don't move or look like that.

one thing is for sure.  i will never take a ufo report lightly or dismiss anybody's report.  what i witnessed definitely was creepy.

the photo i took just shows you the area from where the objects originated, in the south west sky from my position at the hudson river, new york city/new jersey border.

i'll be religiously checking the internet and news for any info on this.
content.summary: A boomerang shaped object, which contorted, was followed by small circular objects

content.detailedDescription: I was heading south on 19th st. when i noticed a flat metallic blimp  moving right to left just a few feet above two story row homes. the object flew into trees and disappeared. please if anyone witnessed this object, please make a report, i need confirmation of this sighting.
content.summary: Flat metallic object ---below treetop level

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family was visiting with my grandparents in springfield,oregon.  this was in the summer of 1963-66.  it's been awhile.  anyway, my cousin mike and me had walked to the indoor swimming pole to go swimming for awhile.  we were supposed to be back home before it got dark but we stayed there longer than we should have.  when we did decide to start for home, we took a shortcut through the school yards.  it was already dark when we started for home.  we were on a path that ran beside the baseball field when we both noticed a strange feeling and the fact that it seemed way to quiet.  don't know why, but we both looked up at the same time and totally freaked out(that's an old term for being really scarred). all we could see was this very big round shaped thing with different colored lights all around it.  it was not making any noise and it seemed like it was almost close enough to touch.  it was so big that we couldn't even see the sky, only this thing!  it was just floating directly above us.  we were crying and screaming and running as fast as we could, neither of us looked up again.  we don't know how far we ran, although it seemed like not very far, when we ran into my older brother and my older cousin.  they had been sent to find us and bring us home. we were in big trouble.  they wanted to know why we were crying and screaming, so we told them.  my brother did not beleve us but my older cousin david did.  at least he said that it could be true.  we couldn't even remember going swimming or anything that night except what i just told you about.  all i remember prior to that is that i know that we were there to go swimming, and i assume that we did.
many years later, i was not certain if this had really happened, or if it was all just a dream.  as a young adult, i asked my cousin mike if he remembered anything weird that had happened to us when we were kids.  that's all that i said.  his reply was"you mean that night that we went swimming and saw that thing above us?"  that confirmed that it was real and that it was not a dream.  all of my life since that night i have had something like a dream but not a dream.  it's alway's the same and it's about many ufo's coming to this planet.  pretty weird huh?  why didn't i report this along time ago?  too who?
content.summary: It was very big, round, quiet, with many lights

content.detailedDescription: We were working outside when a helicopter passed by above our house making quite a bit of noise. it was coming from the north heading south. as a natural response, i looked up to observe what kind it was (medical/military etc.). it did not seem military nor medical so i left it at that. as it was fading out of sight, i noticed a shiny cylindrical object heading the same direction and approximately at the same altitude. it made absolutely no noise that was audible to our ears. i started yelling to my uncle to see what i was looking at. we were both speechless. we watched it head south at steady pace for about another 15 seconds and then it just blinked out. it was gone. not by speeding up but rather just becoming invisible against the blue sky. then another helicopter came also from the north heading the same direction. it looked exactly the same as the first one, no visible id, no flashing lights. it also made quite a bit of noise. i kept gazing at the sky but did not see any other activity. this was the third time in my life i saw something weird in the sky. the object looked like a large shiny metal pipe. it had no visible appendages, wings, propulsion system and was completely silent.
content.summary: Metalic silver cylinder shaped object - no wings - no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-95 north in ri at approximately 3:30 am on 10/12/2008. i had one passenger in the car who also witnessed the event. we saw what looked like a blinking/flashing white light plummet straight down from the sky. the light was much bigger than a star (maybe 5 times bigger than a star ��� it honestly looked like a light you���d see on a plane, but there was only one), and did not appear to be a meteor because there was no smoke trail or streak that we could see. the highway is lined with trees, so once it went behind the tree line we couldn���t see an impact, nor did we see a glow or fire that would possibly happen if it was a plane crash. we discussed it for a while (did you just see that?!?), and we thought it might have been a small plane that crashed ��� we were approaching west warwick ri, which is where tf greene airport is located. (as far as the airport goes ��� i travel this route often, mostly at night, and i am comfortably familiar with the planes that come and go from the airport. i have never witnessed anything that appeared to plummet before, and it was about 3:30 in the morning.) for the record, neither of us was drunk or impaired in any way. i checked the web as soon as i got home because we were convinced it was a plane crash but i couldn���t find any info. the road was pretty deserted, and the whole thing happened in maybe 5 seconds, but i���m really curious to see if anyone else saw something odd that night.
content.summary: Blinking light dropped out of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to my balcony to have a cigarette (i only smoke outside), then all of a sudden i saw this enormous object with flashing red and amber (?) coloured lights coming in the direction of my apartment building at a speed that must have been 6-8 times faster than i have ever seen any plane move. i quickly grabbed my hp digital camera (which i keep on a shelf right in front of my balcony door) and i captured the first photo of it (the best visual one), then i was waiting for it to pass this tree outside of my balcony to take another photo, but it seemed to slow down its speed and was taking a long time, so i captured the second photo of it through the tree (2nd best visual), then i went to take the 3rd photo and my camera's l.E.D. display read "waiting for flash to recharge", so during this time the object seemed to really speed up again (i yelled out loudly "does anyone else see that?", in attempt to get any neighbors outside at the time to look up) and was almost out of sight, but i aimed the camera in its direction and captured the 3rd photo (the least visual one) anyways. 

i felt so "in awe" of its presence during the flyover, my heart was racing... this object looked like something straight out of a high-budget sci-fi movie, but it was real, and above my head in the open sky! it looked sort of like a "spiked orb", but i am not sure if the "spikes" were just a projection from the bright lights, or were actual "spikes" protruding from the "orb shaped" object. i was so excited, i had to light up another cigarette immediately after finishing the one i had smoked during the ufo sighting. 

i "uploaded the pictures" to my computer as soon as i awoke the next morning (today, sunday oct. 12th/2008), as i was too shaken and excited to do it before sleeping, and i didn't want to accidentally "delete" or "lose" them in my excited state. surprisingly, the "lights i had seen, didn't appear in either 3 of the photos, but the "orb shape" itself sure did!

i am only going to upload the 2nd photo, the one with it partially obscured by the tree; but if anyone could steer me in the proper and secure method of submitting them for analysis (possibly at [u.W.O.] the university of western ontario?). this is a major event in my life, any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. i often take pictures of the sky during the day, cloud formations, chem-trails, and planes (ok, the squirrels & chipmunks playing in the tree beside my balcony too... cuz they are cute!), but that is why i keep my hp photosmart e327 5.0 megapixel camera beside my balcony door. it's not that great of a camera, but it was on sale and i am only a "beginner" (amateur) photographer.

thanks to any (and all) that can lend any type of support.
content.summary: This object moved faster than any plane i had seen, but also changed its speeds, periodically.

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out to use the bathroom, and i saw something hovering over our house. i love to look up at the stars because of their beauty. then i saw something hovering over my house. i was going to get a camer, but i was scared that when i come back it would be gone. i thought it was a ufo when i first saw it because, i love reading about ufo's and this was amazing and such a wonderful moment for me. anyways, it stayed still for about one minute and then it started moving at a fast speed. it went side to side, up and down, i didn't know what it was doing. i was so excited and scared at the same time, when i was the ufo. it was amazimg and i enjoyed it very much. after about eight minutes, it zoomed out of sight. i waited to see if it would come back for about three minutes, but it was cold outside, and i had to go back in. it was an amazing sight. sorry, i don't have any videos and photos, just an eye witness, but if i do happen to catch a ufo on video or in pictures, this is the first sight that i will report it on!!!
content.summary: I was outside of my house

content.detailedDescription:
location: fort smith, ar
shape: teardrop
duration:3 - 4 hours
unidentified objects witnessed by hundreds over fort smith arkansas

it was just after dusk on an august evening in 1967. the a.M. station that my sister and i listened to began to report lights in the skies over fort smith. of course i immediately ran out into the yard to see for myself. huge oak trees largely blocked the view and after a few minutes of surveying the patches of sky overhead i gave up. the reports continued to pour in and the disc jockey was at a fever pitch. i summoned my dad who listened for while, then i remember him laughing and saying that the station was playing a joke. at some point he began to take the reports somewhat seriously and we climbed into his ���46 plymouth and drove to a remote area known as wild cat mountain lake. it was wide open and afforded as much of a horizon-to-horizon view as anywhere in the fort smith area. we sat on the hood for a long time until i bored and climbed back in the car. almost immediately i heard my dad shout something and scampering back out found him pointing at two white lights moving slowly across the sky from east to west. they weren���t very bright and if they had not have been moving, would have easily blended in with the stars. they were traveling side by side, about two fingers apart at arm���s length. when they were almost directly overhead they suddenly made opposite 90-degree turns and quickly accelerated out of sight. shortly after, a solitary light, much brighter, tracked across the sky at a tremendous rate of speed. it took probably less than 15 seconds to traverse the sky from the east to the west horizon. we sped back home to find several of our neighbors in lawn chairs ��� in the street! the next three to four hours we watched an amazing display. as time went on the lights came in at lower altitudes and glowed the spectrum from white to orange, with the intensity (brightness) increasing as they became more orange. as i recall, they would glow brightest when hovering. at their closest and brightest, they were perhaps one-third the size of a full moon. i can���t estimate the altitud e, but at one point i did contemplate fetching my bb gun and taking a pot shot. so, bad idea aside they did come in very low. they would fly in formations of two or three, stop suddenly, hover, make impossible turns, and accelerate out of sight in seconds. it was almost as though it were choreographed for the benefit of the crowd below. at one point when a single object hovered directly overhead, i was able to observe it at length through a powerful pair of binoculars offered by a neighbor. it was more or less triangular shaped, not sharply, but more like a guitar pick. i���ve heard descriptions of spheres and chevrons being seen that night, but that was not what i was looking at. if those other accounts are accurate then there was either more than one type of object or the shape was not static. this thing appeared to glow from within, like an old christmas tree light bulb and there was some sort of structure resembling a grid or a checkerboard on the underside. at least one television station and a radio station were broadcasting live from the parking lot of the coca-cola bottling plant, less than a mile west of the fort smith airport which shares a common runway with the 188th fighter wing, known at the time as the 188th tactical reconnaissance group. both the airport and the air guard are in virtual line of sight of the parking lot and it was thought curious that no jets were scrambled during that evening, more so as antidotal evidence surfaced in the following days that the objects had been painted on radar. someone had a transistor radio out on the street that night and we could hear the crowd reacting on the live broadcast as the objects ���performed��� so we could be certain that we were seeing the same objects as those at the bottling plant parking lot, which was approximately 2 miles from our location. the next morning the southwest times record ran a front-page story on the sightings, complete with a low-resolution jerky black and white time exposure that to this day still ranks as the worst! ufo pho to i���ve ever seen. needless to say, the town and the media were abuzz. a couple of days later the air force out of little rock released a statement, to the amusement of those who had not seen the objects, explaining away the entire incident as swamp gas. there are two things i can say with certainty about the objects i witnessed: 1) they were solid objects, not gaseous and 2) they were controlled (flying in formation, etc). the speed and maneuverability that these objects soundlessly displayed, is still exponentially greater than any technology even today, almost 40 years later. i would love to hear from others that were witness to the phenomenon that night in 1967. my dad, the neighbor with the binoculars and i���m sure many others are no longer with us. let���s not let this story die as well. i'm guessing at the date based upon other reports, so if you are certain of the exact date please post.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 67 fort smith mass sighting

content.detailedDescription: My husband was following me home when i noticed people outside there homes on the phone looking up...People were pulled over outside the vehicles on phone looking up...I knew i had to see what the deal was.  i pulled over jumped out and looked in the direction all the people i had seen looking.  i witnessed a brightly illuminated(blue) object in the sky.  it was just right there motionless(or so it seemed to the naked eye) not too much higher then out tallest building of around 12 floors.  it was unlike anything i have ever seen.  my husband pulled up next to me and i told him to hurry and look.  we sped home to witness this with out children and grab our binoculars for a closer look.  the object seemed to slowly move closer then stop.  at first the shape was round and bright blue in color. we took pictures.  it changed color to a solid orange/red, then began changing shapes. pear shape, round, oblong, oval, as well as changing to being outlined in orange/red.  i made sure i was propped against car to steady my arms as we were looking through our binoculars and discussing everything we were seeing.  the object made irratic darting movements, causing me to constantly have to re-find and re-focus it. after about 5-10 min. it slowly slowly began drifting up at about a 70 degree angle. as it got higher it again changed color back to the brilliant blue only outlined this time.  by the time it was almost out of sight, passed the stars, it was barely even light outside.  it was awesome
content.shape: Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Egg,  Sphere,  Teardrop
content.summary: Bright illuminating blue object that changed colors and shapes

content.detailedDescription:
Our house looks out to sea on the costa del sol and is quite elevated. my daughter (15) and i were having dinner and something caught my attention through the patio door windows. i saw 3 objects moving extremely slowly upwards. we both dashed out onto the terrace to see them a bit better. there was no noise from them. 
we are used to seeing helicopters, military aircraft and commercial aircraft around here and therfore know generally what we are looking at. this night there was a slight haze, but could see the stars and moon easily.
each object had 3 amber lights forming a triangle. my daughter thinks that one of them has a red flashing light. they were not exactly very large, but they were the brightest and biggest lights i have eveer seen in the sky.
one was slightly ahead of the other two, but they formed a vague line going from the horizon towards the atmosphere. the first one disappeared suddenly after about a minute and the second one swerved a couple of times ie. it did not go straight like the first one. gradually the remaining two went up into the atmosphere (not across the sky) and suddenly dissaperared. this was the confusing bit, as, if they had gone across the sky i might have thought they were a weird military aircraft, but as they went straight up like rockets, this was not a usual sighting.
being a ufo sceptic, i was not frightened thinking that there must be a logical explanation the the sighting. i have been on the internet all morning trying to find out if there was a reason for this, but up to now i cannot find anything. i would take any suggestions for what this could have been.
my daughter took three photos, but unfortunately have not come out very well due to movement so i won���t post them along with this report unless someone requests them.
content.summary: 3 objects, each with 3 lights forming a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the bed of my truck in my driveway and i was looking at the stars. i noticed a star that looked as though it was shifting side to side. as i continued watching, it appeared to not be a star but more of a unconfined object of light that was making circular rotations as it slowly moved around in a small area of the sky. i felt enticed to continue watching it, and intrigued by its interesting motions. after watching it for approximately forty minutes, i went inside. when i went back outside about two hours later, it was no longer in the sky.
content.summary: Multi-colored light moving in circular rotations making slight movements around a possibly specific area.
